member.name: M:ML.Utils.Mandrill.IMandrillApi.AddTemplate(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.param: The name for the new template - must be unique.
A default sending address for emails sent using this template.
A default from name to be used.
A default subject line to be used.
The HTML code for the template with mc:edit attributes for the editable elements.
A default text part to be used when sending with this template.
Set to false to add a draft template without publishing.
Array of up to 10 labels to use for filtering templates.

member.name: M:ML.Utils.Mandrill.IMandrillApi.UpdateTemplate(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Update the code for an existing template.
member.param: The template name.
A default sending address for emails sent using this template.
A default from name to be used.
A default subject line to be used.
The HTML code for the template with mc:edit attributes for the editable elements.
A default text part to be used when sending with this template.
Set to false to update a draft template without publishing.
Array of up to 10 labels to use for filtering templates.
member.remarks: If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.
member.returns: The object of the template that was updated

member.name: M:ML.Utils.Mandrill.IMandrillApi.UpdateTemplateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Update the code for an existing template, asynchronously.
member.param: The template name.
A default sending address for emails sent using this template.
A default from name to be used.
A default subject line to be used.
The HTML code for the template with mc:edit attributes for the editable elements.
A default text part to be used when sending with this template.
Set to false to update a draft template without publishing.
Array of up to 10 labels to use for filtering templates.
member.remarks: If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.
member.returns: The object of the template that was updated

A default sending address for emails sent using this template.
A default from name to be used.
A default subject line to be used.
The HTML code for the template with mc:edit attributes for the editable elements.
A default text part to be used when sending with this template.
Set to false to add a draft template without publishing.
Array of up to 10 labels to use for filtering templates.

member.name: M:ML.Utils.Mandrill.MandrillApi.UpdateTemplate(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Update the code for an existing template.
member.param: The template name.
A default sending address for emails sent using this template.
A default from name to be used.
A default subject line to be used.
The HTML code for the template with mc:edit attributes for the editable elements.
A default text part to be used when sending with this template.
Set to false to update a draft template without publishing.
Array of up to 10 labels to use for filtering templates.
member.remarks: If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.
member.returns: The object of the template that was updated

member.name: M:ML.Utils.Mandrill.MandrillApi.UpdateTemplateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Update the code for an existing template, asynchronously.
member.param: The template name.
A default sending address for emails sent using this template.
A default from name to be used.
A default subject line to be used.
The HTML code for the template with mc:edit attributes for the editable elements.
A default text part to be used when sending with this template.
Set to false to update a draft template without publishing.
Array of up to 10 labels to use for filtering templates.
member.remarks: If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.
member.returns: The object of the template that was updated
